oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Painting showing a large gathering at Sycamore Shoals (patriots from Tennessee coming together for the march to Kings Mountain in the Carolinas).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: In 1780 patriot frontier militia groups gathered for a 14-day march over the Blue Ridge Mountains towards Kings Mountain to fight British Loyalists during the Revolutionary War.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: RG 82: Tennessee Department of Conservation Photograph Collection, 1937-1976
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Paintings; Picture frames; Dogs; Horses; Soldiers; Women; Children
